message:
SYSTEM: OWS_-_06_-_Lifecycle-selection.pdf: Página 23
NeOn Lifecycle Models
©Asunción Gómez-Pérez, Carmen Suarez-Figueroa
Scenarios
1. Building ontology networks from scratch without reusing existing 
resources.
2. Building ontology networks by reusing non ontological resources.
3. Building ontology networks by reusing ontologies or ontology modules.
4. Building ontology networks by reusing and reengineering ontologies or 
ontology modules.
5. Building ontology networks by reusing and merging ontology or ontology 
modules.
6. Building ontology networks by reusing, merging and reengineering
ontologies or ontology modules.
7. Building ontology networks by restructuring ontologies or ontology 
modules.
8. Building ontology networks by localizing ontologies or ontology modules.
speaker: SYSTEM
